messages.textToSpeech: How else can I help you?

messages.speech: Students with disability face challenges at different walks of life, writing examinations being a primary one. Disabilities like visual impairment and physical disability make the students dependent on others to write their examinations which involves a lot of complexities. Assistive technologies can help the students be independent and compete with fellow students from mainstream society on par. This paper is not about reinventing the wheel, rather a proposal on smart integration of appropriate technologies to build a solution beneficial to the society.
